content.body: The September 2021 TC39-TG2 meeting begins in ~14 hours.  Looking for note-takers!
@sffc: I think the necessary changes are in IsSanctionedSimpleUnitIdentifier, which should reference CLDR (common/validity/unit.xml) and not imply that UTS #35 itself contains the list of units
* @sffc: I think the necessary changes are in IsSanctionedSimpleUnitIdentifier, which should reference CLDR (common/validity/unit.xml) and not imply that UTS #35 itself contains the list of units

m.new_content.body: @sffc: I think the necessary changes are in IsSanctionedSimpleUnitIdentifier, which should reference CLDR (common/validity/unit.xml) and not imply that UTS #35 itself contains the list of units

content.body: it would also be nice to reference the specific tokens of UTS #35, e.g. core_unit_identifier and/or simple_unit
Sounds good; can you post that in the issue thread?
